sentences.sContent: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.sCn: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.sContent: I only went for Kay’s sake.
I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.sCn: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

synos.tran: 目的；利益；理由；日本米酒

trans.tranOther: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something
